import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [match]) return ( <> Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
